Reviews.Content: complain price offered travel zoo arrived discover enormous generator running throttle outside unfortunately hotel received power cut days prior fixed top floor generator sleep walking boston day hotel charm friendly staff overpowering smell cleaning fragrance entry foyer bed firm sleep pillows overslept ate breakfast corner dunkin donuts

Reviews.Title: “Grim”

Reviews.Content: lobby facade hotel dont look bad grim reminded dorm university sheets bed dorm actually fit comforter duvet designed bed matter dorm heat source blow hot air head slept heater hotel bed wouldnt hotel dirty furniture cheap bathroom shabby love stepping shower placing feet grungy nonslip matting shower curtain rings rod couldnt actually close curtain depressing yellow walls throughout banged hotels bathrooms quirky ive stayed boston park plaza hotel hotel park plaza palace compared depressing little hole couldnt wait leave noticed front desk enjoyed stay question answer

Reviews.Title: “Convenient, simple, inexpensive”

Reviews.Content: ive staying 10 yrs ha doesnt look changed paint furniture tile scrub showers cant price youre princess ha recommend

Reviews.Title: “You pay for location”
Reviews.Author: Christidis
Reviews.Content: husband stayed 4 nights chose central location airport 5 minute walk green line dunkin donuts corner breakfast pretty decent cereal toast bagels pastries muffins tea coffee juice fruit hotel theyve tried updating furniture walked lobby musty smell consider incidentals affordable clean city center thats front desk staff nice complimentary internet access business center printing stay top notch hotel

Reviews.Content: wife spent night hotel weekend 69 getting deal travel pleasantly surprised size bigger stayed previous night omni parker house checkout time noon store bags wwe walked city complimentry breakfast kept till lunch

Reviews.Title: “Adequate Hotel...Perfect Location!”
Reviews.Author: tbajardi
Reviews.Content: wer boston conference held westin special rate 309 night street little historic hotel 2 sized beds 139night walked conference day saved 200night clean looks renovation 70s bathrooms brown porcelain tile tvs tube tvs etc lobby gorgeous breakfastcoffee morning served nice sun built form hotel hotel near orange green lines short walk street shopping literally copley square front door incredibly low price location beds comfortable water hot elevators happy lot spend boston
